mapper.select: SELECT r.num, r.movie_id AS movieId, r.user_id AS userId, r.cdate, r.onum, r.nested, r.rating, r.like_count AS likeCount, r.cont, u.nickname FROM review r JOIN member u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.movie_id = #{movieId} ORDER BY r.onum DESC, r.nested ASC, r.num ASC
SELECT movie_id AS movieId, onum, nested, user_id AS userId FROM review WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (movie_id, user_id, cdate, onum, nested, rating, like_count, cont) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{onum}, #{nested}, #{rating}, 0, #{cont})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET onum = onum + 1 WHERE onum >= #{onum}
UPDATE review SET onum = #{onum} WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE review SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE review SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE num = #{num} AND like_count > 0
mapper.select: SELECT like_count FROM review WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM review WHERE movie_id = #{movieId} AND nested = 1 AND rating > 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE onum = #{onum} AND nested >= #{nested}
